comments:
Eclipse 3.1 M7 + CDT 3.0.0 Build I200506141049

Position the cursor at a blank line in Disassembly view, and Run to line or 
Resume at Line will generate a popup error and a NPE:

Error 2005-06-16 13:43:35.937 Exception processing debug async queue
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.internal.core.model.CStackFrame.runToAddress
(CStackFrame.java:835)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.debug.internal.ui.actions.RunToLineAdapter$2.run
(RunToLineAdapter.java:106)
	at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$AsynchJob.run
(DebugPlugin.java:1026)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:67)
